title: KennyR
author: KennyR
content: International Hockey Federation have withdrawn the hosting rights.ITIA have banned two time grand slam champion Simona Halep for four years for doping violations.Rohit Sharma becomes 6th Indian player to cross 10000 runs after Tendulkar, Kohli, Ganguly, Dravid and Dhoni.Juventus midfielder Pogba into doping issue and suspended by Italian anti-doping authorities.Portugal had made historical win against Luxembourg 9-0 without the presence of Ronaldo, who was suspended due to the accumulation of yellow cards in previous group games.

comments.author: KennyR
comments.body: Pakistan and Sri Lanka to play in the super 4 match as if like playing Semi final match.Croatia to face disciplinary action on the issue of fascist flag from the fans during the Euro 2024 qualifying gameWorld Cup Qualifiers - Bolivia 0-3 Argentina, Ecuador 2-1 Uruguay, Venezuela 1-0 Paraguay, Chile 0-0 Colombia, Peru 0-1 BrazilRohit Sharma and Virat Kohli becomes the fastest to reach 5000 runs partnership in 86 ODI matches.Much needed win achieved by Germany on its friendly match against France and ended its losing streak for the past few months.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: How do you mean with this thread? Do you think you want to keep updating news items that users already know or they can search on their own.... Seriously do you intend to elicit discussion from this thread? If you do, so do you think the items that you will update daily will be followed up? Well I see more of disorganized thread if you are going to update news items here every single day and expect discussion and contribution.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: I also don't see what to come up here. Most threads discusses betting in sports but if you are just posts news, not even related to upcoming matches to bet on its just not going to help. Every sports already has a thread here. I think will make more sense if you update those threads particularly and maybe they can figure what to do with the info you got.

comments.author: KennyR
comments.body: Just a way to share important news associated with the upcoming games and incidents that had happened with different players. Most of the news I've shared were discussed on the respective boards. I've just combined it, someone who isn't much into sports related activities could get to know something happening in the sporting industry. If this isn't necessary anymore I would lock the thread based on the users interest.

comments.author: KennyR
comments.body: Former President of Spanish Football Federation Rubiales denies any wrong doing when question by a Judge.Kyle Walker extended his contract with Manchester City until 2026.Bangladesh made historical win in Asian Cup with its first win against India since 2012.ICC World Cup trophy reached MAC Stadium, Chennai where the first World Cup match for India against Australia is played.Andy Murray beats Leandro Riedi 6-7(7) 6-4 6-4 in the Davis Cup group stage match. Dedicates the win to his grandmother as he lost her funeral.
